Name Rascal/Libraries/Vis/Figure/Properties/endGap

Synopsis End gap in composition.
Function FProperty endGap(bool h,bool v)
Description Specifies if a hcat or grid will end with (half) a gap. See also endGap,vendGap and hendGap.
